message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $600000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $500000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $500000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $550000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $525000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession and offer you the product for $540000. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not sure if this is the best deal for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $520000. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $530000. This is the best I can do. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not sure if this is the best deal for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $515000. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm already at my minimum price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $525000, but no lower. This is my final offer. What do you think?

I appreciate your time and effort, Alice, but I'm still not sure if this is the best deal for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $510000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
